trans-unit.source: Identity Scales
trans-unit.target: 身份尺度

trans-unit.source: Identity scales are a special case of linear scales where the domain and range are identical; the scale and its invert method are thus the identity function. These scales are occasionally useful when working with pixel coordinates, say in conjunction with an axis or brush. Identity scales do not support rangeRound, clamp or interpolate.
trans-unit.target: 同一性量表是线性量表的一种特殊情况，其中域和范围是相同的。标度及其求逆方法就是恒等函数。当使用像素坐标（例如与轴或笔刷结合使用）时，这些比例有时会很有用。同一性刻度不支持rangeRound，clamp或interpolate。

trans-unit.source: Identity scales are a special case of linear scales where the domain and range are identical; the scale and its invert method are thus the identity function. These scales are occasionally useful when working with pixel coordinates, say in conjunction with an axis. Identity scales do not support rangeRound, clamp or interpolate.
trans-unit.target: 同一性量表是线性量表的一种特殊情况，其中域和范围是相同的。标度及其求逆方法因此是恒等函数。当使用像素坐标（例如结合轴）时，这些比例有时会很有用。同一性刻度不支持rangeRound，clamp或interpolate。

trans-unit.source: If
trans-unit.target: If

trans-unit.source: If timer is called within the callback of another timer, the new timer callback (if eligible as determined by the specified delay and time) will be invoked immediately at the end of the current frame, rather than waiting until the next frame. Within a frame, timer callbacks are guaranteed to be invoked in the order they were scheduled, regardless of their start time.
trans-unit.target: 如果计时器被另一个定时器的回调中调用时，新的计时器的回调（如果有资格由指定的确定的延迟和时间）将被立即在当前帧的结束时被调用，而不是等待直到下一帧。在一个框架内，保证定时器回调以预定的顺序被调用，而不管它们的开始时间如何。

trans-unit.source: If a or b are undefined or not an object, they are now implicitly converted to the empty object or empty array as appropriate, rather than throwing a TypeError.
trans-unit.target: 如果a或b未定义或不是对象，则现在将它们适当地隐式转换为空对象或空数组，而不是引发TypeError。

trans-unit.source: If align is specified, sets the alignment to the specified value which must be in the range [0, 1]. If align is not specified, returns the current alignment which defaults to 0.5. The alignment determines how any leftover unused space in the range is distributed. A value of 0.5 indicates that the leftover space should be equally distributed before the first band and after the last band; i.e., the bands should be centered within the range. A value of 0 or 1 may be used to shift the bands to one side, say to position them adjacent to an axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定align，则将对齐设置为指定的值，该值必须在[0，1]范围内。如果未指定align，则返回默认为0.5的当前对齐方式。对齐方式确定范围内剩余的未使用空间的分布方式。值为0.5表示剩余空间应在第一个频段之前和最后一个频段之后平均分配；即，波段应在范围内居中。可以使用0或1的值将频段移到一侧，例如将其定位为与轴相邻。

trans-unit.source: If align is specified, sets the alignment to the specified value which must be in the range [0, 1]. If align is not specified, returns the current alignment which defaults to 0.5. The alignment determines how any leftover unused space in the range is distributed. A value of 0.5 indicates that the leftover space should be equally distributed before the first point and after the last point; i.e., the points should be centered within the range. A value of 0 or 1 may be used to shift the points to one side, say to position them adjacent to an axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定align，则将对齐设置为指定的值，该值必须在[0，1]范围内。如果未指定align，则返回默认为0.5的当前对齐方式。对齐方式确定范围内剩余的未使用空间的分布方式。值为0.5表示剩余空间应在第一个点之前和最后一个点之后平均分配；即，点应在范围内居中。可以使用0或1的值将点移到一侧，例如将其放置在轴附近。

trans-unit.source: If align is specified, sets the alignment to the specified value which must be in the range [0, 1]. If align is not specified, returns the current alignment which defaults to 0.5. The alignment specifies how any leftover unused space in the range is distributed. A value of 0.5 indicates that the leftover space should be equally distributed before the first point and after the last point; i.e., the points should be centered within the range. A value of 0 or 1 may be used to shift the points to one side, say to position them adjacent to an axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了align，则将对齐方式设置为指定的值，该值必须在[0，1]范围内。如果未指定align，则返回默认为0.5的当前对齐方式。对齐方式指定范围内剩余的未使用空间的分布方式。值为0.5表示剩余空间应在第一个点之前和最后一个点之后平均分配；即，点应在范围内居中。可以使用0或1的值将点移到一侧，例如将其放置在与轴相邻的位置。

trans-unit.source: If align is specified, sets the alignment to the specified value which must be in the range [0, 1]. If align is not specified, returns the current alignment which defaults to 0.5. The alignment specifies how outer padding is distributed in the range. A value of 0.5 indicates that the outer padding should be equally distributed before the first band and after the last band; i.e., the bands should be centered within the range. A value of 0 or 1 may be used to shift the bands to one side, say to position them adjacent to an axis. For more, see this explainer.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了align，则将对齐方式设置为指定的值，该值必须在[0，1]范围内。如果未指定align，则返回默认为0.5的当前对齐方式。对齐方式指定外部填充在范围内的分布方式。值为0.5表示外部填充应该在第一个频段之前和最后一个频段之后平均分配；即，波段应在范围内居中。可以使用0或1的值将频段移到一侧，例如将其定位为与轴相邻。有关更多信息，请参见此解释器。

trans-unit.source: If alpha is specified, sets the current alpha to the specified number in the range [0,1] and returns this simulation. If alpha is not specified, returns the current alpha value, which defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果阿尔法指定，将当前的α到指定数目的范围为[0,1]，并返回该仿真。如果未指定alpha，则返回当前的alpha值，默认为1。

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the end angle accessor to the specified function and returns this ribbon generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current end angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，将结束角度存取到指定的功能，并返回该色带发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的结束角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the end angle to the specified function or number and returns this arc generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current end angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，将结束角度到指定的功能或数字，并返回该电弧发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的结束角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the overall end angle of the pie to the specified function or number and returns this pie generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current end angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设定馅饼的整体端角到指定的功能或数字，并返回该饼发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的结束角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the overall start angle of the pie to the specified function or number and returns this pie generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current start angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设置的馅饼给指定的函数或数并返回这个馅饼发电机全面启动角。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的起始角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the pad angle accessor to the specified function and returns this ribbon generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current pad angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设定垫角度存取到指定的功能，并返回该色带发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的焊盘角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the pad angle between adjacent groups to the specified number in radians and returns this chord layout. If angle is not specified, returns the current pad angle, which defaults to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设定相邻的基团之间的垫的角度以弧度指定数目并返回此和弦布局。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的焊盘角度，默认为零。

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the pad angle to the specified function or number and returns this arc generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current pad angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设置垫角度所指定的功能或数字，并返回该电弧发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的焊盘角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the pad angle to the specified function or number and returns this pie generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current pad angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设置垫角度所指定的功能或数字，并返回该饼发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的焊盘角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the projection’s clipping circle radius to the specified angle in degrees and returns the projection. If angle is null, switches to antimeridian cutting rather than small-circle clipping. If angle is not specified, returns the current clip angle which defaults to null. Small-circle clipping is independent of viewport clipping via projection.clipExtent.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了角度，则将投影的剪裁圆半径设置为以度为单位的指定角度，然后返回投影。如果角度为零，则切换到后院切割，而不是小圆弧裁剪。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的裁剪角度，默认为null。小圆角裁剪独立于通过投影 .clipExtent进行的视口裁剪。

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the projection’s post-projection planar rotation angle to the specified angle in degrees and returns the projection. If angle is not specified, returns the projection’s current angle, which defaults to 0°. Note that it may be faster to rotate during rendering (e.g., using context.rotate) rather than during projection.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了角度，则将投影的投影后平面旋转角度设置为以度为单位的指定角度，然后返回投影。如果未指定angle，则返回投影的当前角度，默认为0°。注意，在渲染期间（例如，使用context .rotate）旋转比在投影期间旋转可能更快。

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the start angle accessor to the specified function and returns this ribbon generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current start angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设定开始角度存取到指定的功能，并返回该色带发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的起始角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If angle is specified, sets the start angle to the specified function or number and returns this arc generator. If angle is not specified, returns the current start angle accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果角度指定，设定起始角度到指定的功能或数字，并返回该电弧发生器。如果未指定angle，则返回当前的起始角度访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If arguments is not specified, returns the current tick arguments, which defaults to the empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定arguments，则返回当前的tick参数，默认为空数组。

trans-unit.source: If arguments is specified, sets the arguments that will be passed to scale.ticks and scale.tickFormat when the axis is rendered, and returns the axis generator. The meaning of the arguments depends on the axis’ scale type: most commonly, the arguments are a suggested count for the number of ticks (or a time interval for time scales), and an optional format specifier to customize how the tick values are formatted.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数指定，设置参数将被传递到规模 .ticks和规模 .tickFormat当轴渲染，并返回轴发电机。参数的含义取决于轴的刻度类型：最常见的是，参数是对刻度数（或时间刻度的时间间隔）的建议计数，以及一个可选的格式说明符，用于自定义刻度值的格式。

trans-unit.source: If arguments is specified, this method has no effect if the scale does not implement scale.ticks, as with band and point scales. To set the tick values explicitly, use axis.tickValues. To set the tick format explicitly, use axis.tickFormat.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了参数，则如果比例尺不像带状和点状比例尺那样实现比例尺 .ticks，则此方法无效。要显式设置刻度值，请使用轴 .tickValues。要显式设置刻度格式，请使用轴 .tickFormat。

trans-unit.source: If b is a color or a string coercible to a color, use interpolateRgb.
trans-unit.target: 如果b是一种颜色或可转换为该颜色的字符串，请使用interpolateRgb。

trans-unit.source: If b is a date, use interpolateDate.
trans-unit.target: 如果b是日期，请使用interpolateDate。

trans-unit.source: If b is a typed array of numbers, use interpolateNumberArray.
trans-unit.target: 如果b是类型化的数字数组，请使用interpolateNumberArray。

trans-unit.source: If b is a generic array, use interpolateArray.
trans-unit.target: 如果b是一个通用数组，请使用interpolateArray。

trans-unit.source: If b is a number, use interpolateNumber.
trans-unit.target: 如果b是数字，请使用interpolateNumber。

trans-unit.source: If b is a string, use interpolateString.
trans-unit.target: 如果b是字符串，请使用interpolateString。

trans-unit.source: If b is an array, use interpolateArray.
trans-unit.target: 如果b是一个数组，请使用interpolateArray。

trans-unit.source: If b is coercible to a number, use interpolateNumber.
trans-unit.target: 如果b可强制转换为数字，请使用interpolateNumber。

trans-unit.source: If b is null, undefined or a boolean, use the constant b.
trans-unit.target: 如果b为null，未定义或布尔值，则使用常量b。

trans-unit.source: If bandwidth is specified, sets the bandwidth (the standard deviation) of the Gaussian kernel and returns the estimate. If bandwidth is not specified, returns the current bandwidth, which defaults to 20.4939…. The specified bandwidth is currently rounded to the nearest supported value by this implementation, and must be nonnegative.
trans-unit.target: 如果带宽指定，设定高斯核的带宽（标准偏差），并返回的估计。如果未指定带宽，则返回当前带宽，默认为20.4939…。当前，此实现将指定的带宽四舍五入到最接近的支持值，并且必须为非负数。

trans-unit.source: If base is specified, sets the base for this logarithmic scale to the specified value. If base is not specified, returns the current base, which defaults to 10.
trans-unit.target: 如果基地指定，设置此对数标度为指定值的基础。如果未指定base，则返回当前基数，默认为10。

trans-unit.source: If callback is not specified, returns the current callback for the specified typenames, if any. If multiple typenames are specified, the first matching callback is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定callback，则返回指定类型名（如果有）的当前回调。如果指定了多个类型名，则返回第一个匹配的回调。

trans-unit.source: If cellSize is specified, sets the size of individual cells in the underlying bin grid to the specified positive integer and returns the estimator. If cellSize is not specified, returns the current cell size, which defaults to 4. The cell size is rounded down to the nearest power of two. Smaller cells produce more detailed contour polygons, but are more expensive to compute.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了cellSize，则将基础bin网格中单个单元格的大小设置为指定的正整数，并返回估计量。如果未指定cellSize，则返回当前单元格大小，默认为4。单元格大小向下舍入为最接近的2的幂。较小的像元会生成更详细的轮廓多边形，但计算成本较高。

trans-unit.source: If center is specified, sets the circle center to the specified point [longitude, latitude] in degrees, and returns this circle generator. The center may also be specified as a function; this function will be invoked whenever a circle is generated, being passed any arguments passed to the circle generator. If center is not specified, returns the current center accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果中心指定，设定圆心到指定的点[ 经度，纬度 ]以度，并且返回该圆发生器。中心也可以指定为功能；每当生成圆时，将传递给圆生成器的任何参数都将调用此函数。如果未指定center，则返回当前的中心访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If center is specified, sets the projection’s center to the specified center, a two-element array of [longitude, latitude] in degrees and returns the projection. If center is not specified, returns the current center, which defaults to ⟨0°,0°⟩.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了center，则将投影的中心设置为指定的center，以度为单位的[ longitude，latitude ]的两元素数组，并返回投影。如果未指定center，则返回当前中心，默认为⟨0°，0°⟩。

trans-unit.source: If center is specified, sets the projection’s center to the specified center, a two-element array of longitude and latitude in degrees and returns the projection. If center is not specified, returns the current center, which defaults to ⟨0°,0°⟩.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了center，则将投影的中心设置为指定的center，即经度和纬度（以度为单位）的两元素数组，并返回投影。如果未指定center，则返回当前中心，默认为⟨0°，0°⟩。

trans-unit.source: If clamp is not specified, returns whether or not the scale currently clamps values to within the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定钳位，则返回刻度当前是否将值钳位在该范围内。

trans-unit.source: If clamp is specified, enables or disables clamping accordingly. If clamping is disabled and the scale is passed a value outside the domain, the scale may return a value outside the range through extrapolation. If clamping is enabled, the return value of the scale is always within the scale’s range. Clamping similarly applies to continuous.invert. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果钳位指定，启用或禁用相应夹紧。如果夹紧被禁用，并且规模被传递外部的值域，规模可能外侧返回一个值范围通过外推法。如果启用钳位，则秤的返回值始终在秤的范围内。钳位同样适用于连续 .invert。例如：

trans-unit.source: If clamp is specified, sets tile.clampX and tile.clampY to the specified boolean clamp and returns this tile layout. If clamp is not specified, returns true if tile.clampX and tile.clampY are both true, and false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了钳位，则将tile .clampX和tile .clampY设置为指定的布尔钳位，并返回此tile布局。如果未指定钳位，则如果tile .clampX和tile .clampY均为true，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: If clamp is specified, sets whether or not the visible tiles will be clamped in the x-dimension and returns this tile layout. If clamp is not specified, returns whether x-clamping is enabled, which defaults to true. If x-clamping is disabled, then the tile layout may return tiles that are outside the normal bounds 0 ≤ x < 2^z of the “world” tile [0, 0, 0].
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了clamp，则设置是否将可见图块以x维度夹紧，并返回此图块布局。如果未指定钳位，则返回是否启用x -clamping，默认为true。如果禁用x -clamping，则图块布局可能返回超出“ world”图块[0，0，0]的法线边界0≤x <2 ^ z之外的图块。

trans-unit.source: If clamp is specified, sets whether or not the visible tiles will be clamped in the y-dimension and returns this tile layout. If clamp is not specified, returns whether y-clamping is enabled, which defaults to true. If y-clamping is disabled, then the tile layout may return tiles that are outside the normal bounds 0 ≤ y < 2^z of the “world” tile [0, 0, 0].
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了钳位，则设置是否将可见图块以y维度夹紧，并返回此图块布局。如果未指定钳位，则返回是否启用y -clamping，默认为true。如果禁用y -clamping，则图块布局可能会返回超出“ world”图块[0，0，0]的法线边界0≤y <2 ^ z之外的图块。

trans-unit.source: If columns is not specified, the list of column names that forms the header row is determined by the union of all properties on all objects in rows; the order of columns is nondeterministic. If columns is specified, it is an array of strings representing the column names. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果列未指定，形成标题行的列名的列表是通过对所有对象的所有属性的工会确定的行 ;列的顺序不确定。如果指定了columns，则它是代表列名的字符串数组。例如：

trans-unit.source: If compare is specified, sets the chord comparator to the specified function or null and returns this chord layout. If compare is not specified, returns the current chord comparator, which defaults to null. If the chord comparator is non-null, it is used to sort the chords by their combined flow; this only affects the z-order of the chords. See also d3.ascending and d3.descending.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了compare，请将和弦比较器设置为指定的函数或为null，然后返回此和弦布局。如果未指定compare，则返回当前的和弦比较器，默认为null。如果和弦比较器不为空，则用于按和弦的组合流对和弦进行排序；这只会影响和弦的z顺序。另请参见d3.ascending和d3.descending。

trans-unit.source: If compare is specified, sets the data comparator to the specified function and returns this pie generator. If compare is not specified, returns the current data comparator, which defaults to null. If both the data comparator and the value comparator are null, then arcs are positioned in the original input order. Otherwise, the data is sorted according to the data comparator, and the resulting order is used. Setting the data comparator implicitly sets the value comparator to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了compare，则将数据比较器设置为指定的函数并返回此饼图生成器。如果未指定compare，则返回当前数据比较器，默认为null。如果数据比较器和值比较器均为空，则弧将按原始输入顺序放置。否则，根据数据比较器对数据进行排序，并使用结果顺序。隐式设置数据比较器会将值比较器设置为null。

trans-unit.source: If compare is specified, sets the group comparator to the specified function or null and returns this chord layout. If compare is not specified, returns the current group comparator, which defaults to null. If the group comparator is non-null, it is used to sort the groups by their total outflow. See also d3.ascending and d3.descending.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了compare，请将组比较器设置为指定的函数或为null，然后返回此和弦布局。如果未指定compare，则返回当前的组比较器，默认为null。如果组比较器不为空，则用于按组的总流出量对组进行排序。另请参见d3.ascending和d3.descending。

trans-unit.source: If compare is specified, sets the subgroup comparator to the specified function or null and returns this chord layout. If compare is not specified, returns the current subgroup comparator, which defaults to null. If the subgroup comparator is non-null, it is used to sort the subgroups corresponding to matrix[i][0 … n - 1] for a given group i by their total outflow. See also d3.ascending and d3.descending.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了compare，请将子组比较器设置为指定的函数或为null，然后返回此和弦布局。如果未指定compare，则返回当前的子组比较器，默认为null。如果子组比较器非空，则用于按给定组i的总流出量对与矩阵 [ i ] [0… n -1] 对应的子组进行排序。另请参见d3.ascending和d3.descending。

trans-unit.source: If compare is specified, sets the value comparator to the specified function and returns this pie generator. If compare is not specified, returns the current value comparator, which defaults to descending value. The default value comparator is implemented as:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了compare，则将值比较器设置为指定的函数并返回此饼图生成器。如果未指定compare，则返回当前值比较器，默认为递减值。默认值比较器实现为：

trans-unit.source: If constant is specified, sets the symlog constant to the specified number and returns this scale; otherwise returns the current value of the symlog constant, which defaults to 1. See “A bi-symmetric log transformation for wide-range data” by Webber for more.
trans-unit.target: 如果恒定指定，设定symlog常数到指定的号码，并返回这种规模; 否则返回symlog常数的当前值，默认值为1。有关更多信息，请参见Webber的“用于宽范围数据的双对称日志转换”。

trans-unit.source: If constrain is specified, sets the transform constraint function to the specified function and returns the zoom behavior. If constrain is not specified, returns the current constraint function, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果约束指定，将变换约束函数到指定的函数，并返回缩放行为。如果未指定constrain，则返回当前的约束函数，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If container is specified, sets the container accessor to the specified object or function and returns the drag behavior. If container is not specified, returns the current container accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果容器被指定时，将所述容器的存取，以指定的对象或功能，并返回拖动行为。如果未指定container，则返回当前的容器访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this arc generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated arc is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated arc is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该电弧发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的弧作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成的弧的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this arc generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated arc is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated arc is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该电弧发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的弧作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成的弧的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this area generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated area is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated area is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该区域生成。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的区域作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成区域的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this area generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated area is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated area is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该区域生成。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的区域作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成区域的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this line generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated line is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated line is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该线发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则生成的行将作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回代表生成的行的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this line generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated line is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated line is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该线发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则生成的行将作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回代表生成的行的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this link generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated link is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated link is returned. See also d3-path.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，将上下文并返回此链路发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的链接作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成的链接的路径数据字符串。另请参阅d3-path。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this link generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated link is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated link is returned. See also d3-path.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，将上下文并返回此链路发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的链接作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成的链接的路径数据字符串。另请参阅d3-path。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this ribbon generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated ribbon is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated ribbon is returned. See also d3-path.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该色带发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的功能区作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成的功能区的路径数据字符串。另请参阅d3-path。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this ribbon generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated ribbon is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated ribbon is returned. See also d3-path.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该色带发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的功能区作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示生成的功能区的路径数据字符串。另请参阅d3-path。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this symbol generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated symbol is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated symbol is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该符号发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的符号作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示所生成符号的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the context and returns this symbol generator. If context is not specified, returns the current context, which defaults to null. If the context is not null, then the generated symbol is rendered to this context as a sequence of path method calls. Otherwise, a path data string representing the generated symbol is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果上下文指定，设置上下文，并返回该符号发生器。如果未指定context，则返回当前上下文，默认为null。如果上下文不为null，则将生成的符号作为一系列路径方法调用呈现到此上下文。否则，将返回表示所生成符号的路径数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: If context is specified, sets the current render context and returns the path generator. If the context is null, then the path generator will return an SVG path string; if the context is non-null, the path generator will instead call methods on the specified context to render geometry. The context must implement the following subset of the CanvasRenderingContext2D API:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了context，则设置当前渲染上下文并返回路径生成器。如果上下文为null，则路径生成器将返回SVG路径字符串；否则，将返回SVG路径字符串。如果上下文为非null，则路径生成器将改为在指定的上下文上调用方法以渲染几何。上下文必须实现CanvasRenderingContext2D API的以下子集：

trans-unit.source: If curve is specified, sets the curve factory and returns this area generator. If curve is not specified, returns the current curve factory, which defaults to curveLinear.
trans-unit.target: 如果曲线指定，设置曲线的工厂，并返回该区域生成。如果未指定curve，则返回当前曲线工厂，默认为curveLinear。

trans-unit.source: If curve is specified, sets the curve factory and returns this line generator. If curve is not specified, returns the current curve factory, which defaults to curveLinear.
trans-unit.target: 如果曲线指定，设置曲线的工厂，并返回该线发生器。如果未指定curve，则返回当前曲线工厂，默认为curveLinear。

trans-unit.source: If data is a Map, it is implicitly converted to the entry [undefined, data], and the children accessor instead defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果data是Map，则将其隐式转换为条目[undefined，data ]，而子级访问器则默认为：

trans-unit.source: If data is not specified, this method returns the array of data for the selected elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定data，则此方法返回所选元素的数据数组。

trans-unit.source: If decay is specified, sets the alpha decay rate to the specified number in the range [0,1] and returns this simulation. If decay is not specified, returns the current alpha decay rate, which defaults to 0.0228… = 1 - pow(0.001, 1 / 300) where 0.001 is the default minimum alpha.
trans-unit.target: 如果衰减指定，设置阿尔法衰减率在范围[0,1]指定数量，并返回该仿真。如果未指定衰减，则返回当前的alpha衰减率，默认为0.0228…= 1- pow（0.001，1/300），其中0.001是默认的最小alpha。

trans-unit.source: If decay is specified, sets the velocity decay factor to the specified number in the range [0,1] and returns this simulation. If decay is not specified, returns the current velocity decay factor, which defaults to 0.4. The decay factor is akin to atmospheric friction; after the application of any forces during a tick, each node’s velocity is multiplied by 1 - decay. As with lowering the alpha decay rate, less velocity decay may converge on a better solution, but risks numerical instabilities and oscillation.
trans-unit.target: 如果衰减指定，设定速度衰减因子，以在范围[0,1]指定数量，并返回该仿真。如果未指定衰减，则返回当前速度衰减因子，默认为0.4。衰减因子类似于大气摩擦。在滴答声中施加任何力后，每个节点的速度乘以1- 衰减。与降低alpha衰减率一样，较少的速度衰减可能会收敛于更好的解决方案，但会出现数值不稳定和振荡的风险。

trans-unit.source: If defined is specified, sets the defined accessor to the specified function or boolean and returns this area generator. If defined is not specified, returns the current defined accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果定义被指定时，将所定义的访问到所指定的功能或布尔并返回此区域生成。如果定义未指定，返回当前定义存取器，缺省值为：

trans-unit.source: If defined is specified, sets the defined accessor to the specified function or boolean and returns this line generator. If defined is not specified, returns the current defined accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果定义被指定时，将所定义的访问到所指定的功能或布尔并返回此线发生器。如果定义未指定，返回当前定义存取器，缺省值为：

trans-unit.source: If delta is specified, sets the wheel delta function to the specified function and returns the zoom behavior. If delta is not specified, returns the current wheel delta function, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果增量指定，设置车轮δ函数到指定的函数，并返回缩放行为。如果未指定delta，则返回当前的转轮delta函数，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If distance is specified, sets the distance accessor to the specified number or function, re-evaluates the distance accessor for each link, and returns this force. If distance is not specified, returns the current distance accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果距离指定，设定距离存取到指定的数或功能，重新评估每个链路的距离存取，并返回该力。如果未指定distance，则返回当前的距离访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If distance is specified, sets the maximum distance between nodes over which this force is considered. If distance is not specified, returns the current maximum distance, which defaults to infinity. Specifying a finite maximum distance improves performance and produces a more localized layout.
trans-unit.target: 如果距离指定，设置在其上该力被认为是节点之间的最大距离。如果未指定distance，则返回当前最大距离，默认为无穷大。指定有限的最大距离可以提高性能，并产生更局部的布局。

trans-unit.source: If distance is specified, sets the maximum distance that a double-tap gesture can move between first touchstart and second touchend that will trigger a subsequent double-click event. If distance is not specified, returns the current distance threshold, which defaults to 10. The distance threshold is measured in client coordinates (event.clientX and event.clientY).
trans-unit.target: 如果距离指定，设置一个双敲击手势可以首先touchstart和第二touchend将触发随后的双击事件之间移动的最大距离。如果未指定distance，则返回当前距离阈值，默认为10。该距离阈值以客户端坐标（事件.clientX和事件.clientY）进行度量。

trans-unit.source: If distance is specified, sets the maximum distance that the mouse can move between mousedown and mouseup that will trigger a subsequent click event. If at any point between mousedown and mouseup the mouse is greater than or equal to distance from its position on mousedown, the click event following mouseup will be suppressed. If distance is not specified, returns the current distance threshold, which defaults to zero. The distance threshold is measured in client coordinates (event.clientX and event.clientY).
trans-unit.target: 如果距离指定，将鼠标可以鼠标按下之间并移动鼠标松开，将触发后续click事件的最大距离。如果在mousedown和mouseup之间的任何点处，鼠标距其在mousedown上的位置的距离大于或等于其距离，则将抑制mouseup之后的click事件。如果未指定distance，则返回当前距离阈值，默认为零。距离阈值以客户端坐标（事件 .clientX和事件 .clientY）进行度量。

trans-unit.source: If distance is specified, sets the minimum distance between nodes over which this force is considered. If distance is not specified, returns the current minimum distance, which defaults to 1. A minimum distance establishes an upper bound on the strength of the force between two nearby nodes, avoiding instability. In particular, it avoids an infinitely-strong force if two nodes are exactly coincident; in this case, the direction of the force is random.
trans-unit.target: 如果距离指定，设置在其上该力被认为是节点之间的最小距离。如果未指定distance，则返回当前的最小距离，默认为1。最小距离为两个附近节点之间的力强度确定了上限，从而避免了不稳定。特别是，如果两个节点恰好重合，则可以避免施加无限大的力。在这种情况下，力的方向是随机的。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the domain accessor to the specified function or array and returns this bin generator. If domain is not specified, returns the current domain accessor, which defaults to extent. The bin domain is defined as an array [min, max], where min is the minimum observable value and max is the maximum observable value; both values are inclusive. Any value outside of this domain will be ignored when the bins are generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果域指定，设定域存取，以指定的功能或数组，并返回该仓生成器。如果未指定domain，则返回当前的域访问器，默认为scope。 bin域定义为数组[ min，max ]，其中min是最小可观察值，max是最大可观察值；这两个值都包含在内。生成bin时，将忽略此域之外的任何值。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the domain accessor to the specified function or array and returns this histogram generator. If domain is not specified, returns the current domain accessor, which defaults to extent. The histogram domain is defined as an array [min, max], where min is the minimum observable value and max is the maximum observable value; both values are inclusive. Any value outside of this domain will be ignored when the histogram is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果域指定，设定域存取，以指定的功能或数组，并返回该直方图发生器。如果未指定domain，则返回当前的域访问器，默认为scope。直方图域定义为数组[ min，max ]，其中min是最小可观察值，max是最大可观察值；这两个值都包含在内。生成直方图时，将忽略此域之外的任何值。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the domain of the quantile scale to the specified set of discrete numeric values. The array must not be empty, and must contain at least one numeric value; NaN, null and undefined values are ignored and not considered part of the sample population. If the elements in the given array are not numbers, they will be coerced to numbers. A copy of the input array is sorted and stored internally. If domain is not specified, returns the scale’s current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果域指定，设定位数规模到指定的组离散数值的域。该数组不能为空，并且必须至少包含一个数字值。 NaN，空值和不确定值将被忽略，不被视为样本总体的一部分。如果给定数组中的元素不是数字，则将它们强制为数字。输入数组的副本在内部排序并存储。如果未指定domain，则返回比例的当前域。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the domain to the specified array of values. The first element in domain will be mapped to the first band, the second domain value to the second band, and so on. Domain values are stored internally in a map from stringified value to index; the resulting index is then used to determine the band. Thus, a band scale’s values must be coercible to a string, and the stringified version of the domain value uniquely identifies the corresponding band. If domain is not specified, this method returns the current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果域指定，设定域设置为指定值的数组。域中的第一个元素将映射到第一频段，第二个域值映射到第二频段，依此类推。域值在内部存储在从字符串化值到索引的映射中；然后，将所得的索引用于确定频段。因此，频段标度的值必须可对字符串强制，并且域值的字符串化版本唯一标识相应的频段。如果未指定domain，则此方法返回当前域。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the domain to the specified array of values. The first element in domain will be mapped to the first element in the range, the second domain value to the second range value, and so on. Domain values are stored internally in a map from stringified value to index; the resulting index is then used to retrieve a value from the range. Thus, an ordinal scale’s values must be coercible to a string, and the stringified version of the domain value uniquely identifies the corresponding range value. If domain is not specified, this method returns the current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果域指定，设定域设置为指定值的数组。域中的第一个元素将映射到范围中的第一个元素，第二个域值映射到第二个范围值，依此类推。域值在内部存储在从字符串化值到索引的映射中；然后将所得的索引用于从范围中检索值。因此，序数标度的值必须可对字符串强制，并且域值的字符串化版本唯一标识相应的范围值。如果未指定domain，则此方法返回当前域。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the domain to the specified array of values. The first element in domain will be mapped to the first point, the second domain value to the second point, and so on. Domain values are stored internally in a map from stringified value to index; the resulting index is then used to determine the point. Thus, a point scale’s values must be coercible to a string, and the stringified version of the domain value uniquely identifies the corresponding point. If domain is not specified, this method returns the current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果域指定，设定域设置为指定值的数组。域中的第一个元素将映射到第一个点，第二个域值映射到第二个点，依此类推。域值在内部存储在从字符串化值到索引的映射中；然后将所得的索引用于确定该点。因此，点标度的值必须可对字符串强制，并且域值的字符串化版本唯一标识相应的点。如果未指定domain，则此方法返回当前域。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the scale’s domain to the specified array of numbers. The array must contain two or more elements. If the elements in the given array are not numbers, they will be coerced to numbers. If domain is not specified, returns a copy of the scale’s current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了domain，则将比例尺的域设置为指定的数字数组。该数组必须包含两个或多个元素。如果给定数组中的元素不是数字，则将它们强制为数字。如果未指定domain，则返回秤的当前域的副本。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the scale’s domain to the specified array of values. The values must be in ascending order or the behavior of the scale is undefined. The values are typically numbers, but any naturally ordered values (such as strings) will work; a threshold scale can be used to encode any type that is ordered. If the number of values in the scale’s range is N+1, the number of values in the scale’s domain must be N. If there are fewer than N elements in the domain, the additional values in the range are ignored. If there are more than N elements in the domain, the scale may return undefined for some inputs. If domain is not specified, returns the scale’s current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了domain，则将比例尺的域设置为指定的值数组。值必须按升序排列，否则刻度的行为未定义。这些值通常是数字，但是任何自然排序的值（例如字符串）都可以使用；阈值标度可用于编码有序的任何类型。如果刻度范围内的值数为N + 1，则刻度域中的值数必须为N。如果域中的元素数少于N，则将忽略范围内的其他值。如果域中的元素多于N个，则对于某些输入，小数位可能返回未定义。如果未指定domain，则返回比例的当前域。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the scale’s domain to the specified array of values. The values must be in sorted ascending order, or the behavior of the scale is undefined. The values are typically numbers, but any naturally ordered values (such as strings) will work; a threshold scale can be used to encode any type that is ordered. If the number of values in the scale’s range is N+1, the number of values in the scale’s domain must be N. If there are fewer than N elements in the domain, the additional values in the range are ignored. If there are more than N elements in the domain, the scale may return undefined for some inputs. If domain is not specified, returns the scale’s current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了domain，则将刻度的域设置为指定的值数组。值必须按升序排序，否则刻度的行为未定义。这些值通常是数字，但是任何自然排序的值（例如字符串）都可以使用；阈值标度可用于编码有序的任何类型。如果刻度范围内的值数为N + 1，则刻度域中的值数必须为N。如果域中元素数少于N，则将忽略范围内的其他值。如果域中有超过N个元素，则某些输入的小数位数可能返回undefined。如果未指定domain，则返回比例的当前域。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the scale’s domain to the specified two-element array of numbers. If the elements in the given array are not numbers, they will be coerced to numbers. If domain is not specified, returns the scale’s current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了domain，则将刻度的域设置为指定的两元素数字数组。如果给定数组中的元素不是数字，则将它们强制为数字。如果未指定domain，则返回比例的当前域。

trans-unit.source: If domain is specified, sets the scale’s domain to the specified two-element array of numbers. If the elements in the given array are not numbers, they will be coerced to numbers. The numbers must be in ascending order or the behavior of the scale is undefined. If domain is not specified, returns the scale’s current domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了domain，则将比例尺的域设置为指定的两元素数字数组。如果给定数组中的元素不是数字，则将其强制为数字。数字必须按升序排列，否则秤的行为是不确定的。如果未指定domain，则返回比例的当前域。

trans-unit.source: If duration is specified, sets the duration for zoom transitions on double-click and double-tap to the specified number of milliseconds and returns the zoom behavior. If duration is not specified, returns the current duration, which defaults to 250 milliseconds. If the duration is not greater than zero, double-click and -tap trigger instantaneous changes to the zoom transform rather than initiating smooth transitions.
trans-unit.target: 如果持续时间指定，用于设置双击并双击以毫秒为单位，并返回变焦行为指定数量的变焦过渡的时间。如果未指定duration，则返回当前持续时间，默认为250毫秒。如果持续时间不大于零，则双击和-tap会立即触发缩放变换，而不是启动平滑过渡。

trans-unit.source: If exponent is specified, sets the current exponent to the given numeric value. If exponent is not specified, returns the current exponent, which defaults to 1. (Note that this is effectively a linear scale until you set a different exponent.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指数指定，将当前指数给定的数字值。如果未指定指数，则返回当前指数，默认为1。（请注意，这实际上是线性比例，直到您设置其他指数为止。）

trans-unit.source: If extent is not specified, returns the current extent accessor, which defaults to [[0, 0], [width, height]] where width is the client width of the element and height is its client height; for SVG elements, the nearest ancestor SVG element’s width and height is used. In this case, the owner SVG element must have defined width and height attributes rather than (for example) relying on CSS properties or the viewBox attribute; SVG provides no programmatic method for retrieving the initial viewport size. Alternatively, consider using element.getBoundingClientRect. (In Firefox, element.clientWidth and element.clientHeight is zero for SVG elements!)
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定extent，则返回当前的extent访问器，默认为[[0，0]，[ width，height ]]，其中width是元素的客户端宽度，height是其客户端高度；对于SVG元素，使用最接近的祖先SVG元素的宽度和高度。在这种情况下，所有者SVG元素必须具有定义的width和height属性，而不是（例如）依赖CSS属性或viewBox属性； SVG不提供用于检索初始视口大小的编程方法。或者，考虑使用元素 .getBoundingClientRect。 （在Firefox中，对于SVG元素，元素 .clientWidth和元素 .clientHeight为零！）

trans-unit.source: If extent is not specified, returns the current extent accessor, which defaults to [[0, 0], [width, height]] where width is the client width of the element and height is its client height; for SVG elements, the nearest ancestor SVG element’s viewBox, or width and height attributes, are used. Alternatively, consider using element.getBoundingClientRect.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定extent，则返回当前的extent访问器，默认为[[0，0]，[ width，height ]]，其中width是元素的客户端宽度，height是其客户端高度；对于SVG元素，使用最接近的祖先SVG元素的viewBox或width和height属性。或者，考虑使用元素.getBoundingClientRect。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, expands the quadtree to cover the specified points [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]] and returns the quadtree. If extent is not specified, returns the quadtree’s current extent [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]], where x0 and y0 are the inclusive lower bounds and x1 and y1 are the inclusive upper bounds, or undefined if the quadtree has no extent. The extent may also be expanded by calling quadtree.cover or quadtree.add.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了范围，则展开四叉树以覆盖指定的点[[ x0，y0 ]，[ x1，y1 ]]并返回四叉树。如果未指定extent，则返回四叉树的当前范围[[ x0，y0 ]，[ x1，y1 ]]，其中x0和y0为包含下限，x1和y1为包含上限，如果四叉树具有没有范围。范围也可以通过调用quadtree .cover或四叉树 .add。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the brushable extent to the specified array of points [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]], where [x0, y0] is the top-left corner and [x1, y1] is the bottom-right corner, and returns this brush. The extent may also be specified as a function which returns such an array; if a function, it is invoked for each selected element, being passed the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element. If extent is not specified, returns the current extent accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，设定刷涂程度到指定的点[[阵列X0，Y0 ]，[ X1，Y1 ]]，其中[ X0，Y0 ]为左上角和[ X1，Y1 ]是底-右上角，并返回此笔刷。的程度也可以被指定为返回这种阵列的功能; 如果是函数，则为每个选定元素调用该函数，并传递当前数据 d 和索引 i ，并将 this 上下文作为当前DOM元素。如果范围 未指定，则返回当前的扩展区访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the clip extent of the Voronoi layout to the specified bounds and returns the layout. The extent bounds are specified as an array [[

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the major and minor extents of this graticule. If extent is not specified, returns the current minor extent, which defaults to ⟨⟨-180°, -80° - ε⟩, ⟨180°, 80° + ε⟩⟩.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了范围，则设置此刻度的主要和次要范围。如果程度未指定，返回当前小的程度，缺省⟨⟨-180°，-80° - ε⟩，⟨180°，80°+ε⟩⟩。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the major extent of this graticule. If extent is not specified, returns the current major extent, which defaults to ⟨⟨-180°, -90° + ε⟩, ⟨180°, 90° - ε⟩⟩.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，设置此标线的主要范围。如果程度未指定，返回当前主要程度，缺省⟨⟨-180°，-90°+ε⟩，⟨180°，90° - ε⟩⟩。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the minor extent of this graticule. If extent is not specified, returns the current minor extent, which defaults to ⟨⟨-180°, -80° - ε⟩, ⟨180°, 80° + ε⟩⟩.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，设置该格线的小的程度。如果程度未指定，返回当前小的程度，缺省⟨⟨-180°，-80° - ε⟩，⟨180°，80°+ε⟩⟩。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the projection’s viewport clip extent to the specified bounds in pixels and returns the projection. The extent bounds are specified as an array [[

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the scale extent to the specified array of numbers [k0, k1] where k0 is the minimum allowed scale factor and k1 is the maximum allowed scale factor, and returns this zoom behavior. If extent is not specified, returns the current scale extent, which defaults to [0, ∞]. The scale extent restricts zooming in and out. It is enforced on interaction and when using zoom.scaleBy, zoom.scaleTo and zoom.translateBy; however, it is not enforced when using zoom.transform to set the transform explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，设置规模程度到指定的号码[数组K0，K1 ]，其中K0是最小允许比例因子和K1是最大允许的比例因子，并且返回这个缩放行为。如果未指定extent，则返回当前比例范围，默认为[0，∞]。比例范围限制放大和缩小。它在交互时以及使用zoom .scaleBy，zoom .scaleTo和zoom .translateBy时强制执行；但是，使用zoom .transform显式设置转换时不强制执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the translate extent to the specified array of points [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]], where [x0, y0] is the top-left corner of the world and [x1, y1] is the bottom-right corner of the world, and returns this zoom behavior. If extent is not specified, returns the current translate extent, which defaults to [[-∞, -∞], [+∞, +∞]]. The translate extent restricts panning, and may cause translation on zoom out. It is enforced on interaction and when using zoom.scaleBy, zoom.scaleTo and zoom.translateBy; however, it is not enforced when using zoom.transform to set the transform explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，设置于点[[指定数组翻译程度X0，Y0 ]，[ X1，Y1 ]]，其中[ X0，Y0 ]是世界的左上角和[ X1，Y1 ]是世界的右下角，并返回此缩放行为。如果未指定extent，则返回当前转换范围，默认为[[-∞，-∞]，[+∞，+∞]]。平移范围限制了平移，并可能导致缩小时平移。在交互时以及使用zoom .scaleBy，zoom .scaleTo和zoom .translateBy ;但是，使用 zoom .transform显式设置转换时不强制执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the viewport extent to the specified array of points [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]], where [x0, y0] is the top-left corner of the viewport and [x1, y1] is the bottom-right corner of the viewport, and returns this zoom behavior. The extent may also be specified as a function which returns such an array; if a function, it is invoked for each selected element, being passed the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，设置视口范围来分[[指定数组X0，Y0 ]，[ X1，Y1 ]]，其中[ X0，Y0 ]是视和的左上角[ X1，Y1 ]是视口的右下角，并返回此缩放行为。的程度也可以被指定为返回这种阵列的功能;如果是函数，则为每个选定元素调用该函数，并传递当前数据 d 和索引 i ，并将 this 上下文作为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets the viewport extent to the specified array of points [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]], where [x0, y0] is the top-left corner of the viewport and [x1, y1] is the bottom-right corner of the viewport, and returns this zoom behavior. The extent may also be specified as a function which returns such an array; if a function, it is invoked for each selected element, being passed the current datum d, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，设置视口范围来分[[指定数组X0，Y0 ]，[ X1，Y1 ]]，其中[ X0，Y0 ]是视和的左上角[ X1，Y1 ]是视口的右下角，并返回此缩放行为。的程度也可以被指定为返回这种阵列的功能;如果是函数，则为每个选择的元素调用该函数，并传递当前数据 d ，并将 this 上下文作为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets this tile layout’s extent to the specified array of points [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]], where [x0, y0] is the top-left corner and [x1, y1] is the bottom-right corner, and returns this tile layout. If extent is not specified, returns the current layout extent.
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，此瓦布局的程度设置到指定的点[[阵列X0，Y0 ]，[ X1，Y1 ]]，其中[ X0，Y0 ]为左上角和[ X1，Y1 ]是右下角，并返回此图块布局。如果未指定extent，则返回当前布局范围。

trans-unit.source: If extent is specified, sets this tile layout’s viewport extent to the specified array [[x0, y0], [x1, y1]], where [x0, y0] is the top-left corner and [x1, y1] is the bottom-right corner, and returns this tile layout. If extent is not specified, returns the current viewport extent, which defaults to [[0, 0], [960, 500]].
trans-unit.target: 如果范围指定，此瓦布局的视程度设置到指定的数组[[ X0，Y0 ]，[ X1，Y1 ]]，其中[ X0，Y0 ]为左上角和[ X1，Y1 ]是底-右上角，并返回此图块布局。如果程度未指定，返回当前视口范围内，缺省值为[[0,0]，[960，500]。

trans-unit.source: If factory is specified and not null, assigns the attribute tween for the attribute with the specified name to the specified interpolator factory. An interpolator factory is a function that returns an interpolator; when the transition starts, the factory is evaluated for each selected element, in order, being passed the current datum (d), the current index (i), and the current group (nodes), with this as the current DOM element. The returned interpolator will then be invoked for each frame of the transition, in order, being passed the eased time t, typically in the range [0, 1]. Lastly, the return value of the interpolator will be used to set the attribute value. The interpolator must return a string. (To remove an attribute at the start of a transition, use transition.attr; to remove an attribute at the end of a transition, use transition.on to listen for the end event.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了factory且不为null，则将具有指定名称的属性的补间属性分配给指定的插值器factory。插值器工厂是一个返回插值器的函数；过渡开始时，工厂对每个选中的元件进行评价，为了，正在传递的当前数据（d），当前指数（我），和当前组（节点），与此作为当前DOM元素。然后，将为过渡的每个帧调用返回的内插器，以便依次经过轻松的时间t，通常在[0，1]范围内。最后，将使用插值器的返回值来设置属性值。插值器必须返回一个字符串。 （要在过渡开始时删除属性，请使用transition .attr；要在过渡结束时删除属性，请使用transition .on监听结束事件。）

trans-unit.source: If factory is specified and not null, assigns the attribute tween for the attribute with the specified name to the specified interpolator factory. An interpolator factory is a function that returns an interpolator; when the transition starts, the factory is evaluated for each selected element, in order, being passed the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element. The returned interpolator will then be invoked for each frame of the transition, in order, being passed the eased time t, typically in the range [0, 1]. Lastly, the return value of the interpolator will be used to set the attribute value. The interpolator must return a string. (To remove an attribute at the start of a transition, use transition.attr; to remove an attribute at the end of a transition, use transition.on to listen for the end event.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了factory且不为null，则将具有指定名称的属性的补间属性分配给指定的插值器factory。插值器工厂是一个返回插值器的函数；当过渡开始时，将按顺序将当前上下文 d 和索引 i （ this 上下文作为当前DOM元素）传递给每个选定元素的工厂进行评估。然后，将为过渡的每个帧调用返回的插值器，以使它们经过缓解时间t，通常在[0，1]范围内。最后，将使用内插器的返回值来设置属性值。插值器必须返回一个字符串。 （要在过渡开始时删除属性，请使用transition .attr；要在过渡结束时删除属性，请使用transition .on监听结束事件。）

trans-unit.source: If factory is specified and not null, assigns the style tween for the style with the specified name to the specified interpolator factory. An interpolator factory is a function that returns an interpolator; when the transition starts, the factory is evaluated for each selected element, in order, being passed the current datum (d), the current index (i), and the current group (nodes), with this as the current DOM element. The returned interpolator will then be invoked for each frame of the transition, in order, being passed the eased time t, typically in the range [0, 1]. Lastly, the return value of the interpolator will be used to set the style value with the specified priority. The interpolator must return a string. (To remove an style at the start of a transition, use transition.style; to remove an style at the end of a transition, use transition.on to listen for the end event.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了factory并且不为null，则将具有指定名称的样式的样式补间分配给指定的插值器factory。插值器工厂是一个返回插值器的函数；过渡开始时，工厂对每个选中的元件进行评价，为了，正在传递的当前数据（d），当前指数（我），和当前组（节点），与此作为当前DOM元素。然后，将为过渡的每个帧调用返回的插值器，以按顺序通过轻松时间t，通常在[0，1]范围内。最后，将使用插值器的返回值设置具有指定优先级的样式值。插值器必须返回一个字符串。 （要在过渡开始时删除样式，请使用transition .style；要在过渡结束时删除样式，请使用transition .on监听结束事件。）

trans-unit.source: If factory is specified and not null, assigns the style tween for the style with the specified name to the specified interpolator factory. An interpolator factory is a function that returns an interpolator; when the transition starts, the factory is evaluated for each selected element, in order, being passed the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element. The returned interpolator will then be invoked for each frame of the transition, in order, being passed the eased time t, typically in the range [0, 1]. Lastly, the return value of the interpolator will be used to set the style value with the specified priority. The interpolator must return a string. (To remove an style at the start of a transition, use transition.style; to remove an style at the end of a transition, use transition.on to listen for the end event.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了factory并且不为null，则将具有指定名称的样式的样式补间分配给指定的插值器factory。插值器工厂是一个返回插值器的函数；当过渡开始时，将按顺序将当前上下文 d 和索引 i （ this 上下文作为当前DOM元素）传递给每个选定元素的工厂进行评估。然后，将为过渡的每个帧调用返回的插值器，以使它们经过缓解时间t，通常在[0，1]范围内。最后，内插器的返回值将用于设置具有指定优先级的样式值。插值器必须返回一个字符串。（要在过渡开始时删除样式，请使用transition .style；要在过渡结束时删除样式，请使用transition .on监听结束事件。）

trans-unit.source: If factory is specified and not null, assigns the text tween to the specified interpolator factory. An interpolator factory is a function that returns an interpolator; when the transition starts, the factory is evaluated for each selected element, in order, being passed the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element. The returned interpolator will then be invoked for each frame of the transition, in order, being passed the eased time t, typically in the range [0, 1]. Lastly, the return value of the interpolator will be used to set the text. The interpolator must return a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了factory且不为null，则将补间文本分配给指定的插值器factory。插值器工厂是一个返回插值器的函数；当过渡开始时，将依次为每个选定元素评估工厂，并为其传递当前数据 d 和索引 i ，并将 this 上下文作为当前DOM元素。然后，将为过渡的每个帧调用返回的插值器，以使它们经过缓解时间t，通常在[0，1]范围内。最后，内插器的返回值将用于设置文本。插值器必须返回一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: If force is specified, assigns the force for the specified name and returns this simulation. If force is not specified, returns the force with the specified name, or undefined if there is no such force. (By default, new simulations have no forces.) For example, to create a new simulation to layout a graph, you might say:
trans-unit.target: 如果力指定，分配力指定的名称，并返回该模拟。如果未指定force，则返回具有指定名称的force；如果没有这样的force，则返回undefined。 （默认情况下，新的模拟没有作用力。）例如，要创建新的模拟以布置图形，您可能会说：

trans-unit.source: If format is specified, sets the tick format function and returns the axis. If format is not specified, returns the current format function, which defaults to null. A null format indicates that the scale’s default formatter should be used, which is generated by calling scale.tickFormat. In this case, the arguments specified by axis.tickArguments are likewise passed to scale.tickFormat.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式指定，设定蜱格式函数并返回轴线。如果未指定format，则返回当前的format函数，默认为null。空格式表示应使用刻度的默认格式化程序，该默认格式化程序是通过调用scale .tickFormat生成的。在这种情况下，由轴 .tickArguments指定的参数同样会传递给scale .tickFormat。

trans-unit.source: If h, c and g are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to the HCG color space. See d3.color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to HCG.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了h，c和g，则它们表示返回颜色的通道值；的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析后转换为HCG颜色空间。有关示例，请参见d3.color。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后转换为HCG。

trans-unit.source: If h, c and l are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to the HCL color space. See color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to HCL. (Colors already in the HCL color space skip the conversion to RGB, and colors in the Lab color space are converted directly to HCL.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了h，c和l，则它们表示返回的颜色的通道值；的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析后转换为HCL颜色空间。有关示例，请参见颜色。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后转换为HCL。 （HCL颜色空间中已经存在的颜色将跳过向RGB的转换，而Lab颜色空间中的颜色将直接转换为HCL。）

trans-unit.source: If h, s and l are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to the Cubehelix color space. See color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to Cubehelix. (Colors already in the Cubehelix color space skip the conversion to RGB.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了h，s和l，则它们表示返回的颜色的通道值；的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析然后转换为Cubehelix颜色空间。有关示例，请参见颜色。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后转换为Cubehelix。 （Cubehelix颜色空间中已经存在的颜色将跳过向RGB的转换。）

trans-unit.source: If h, s and l are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to the HSL color space. See color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to HSL. (Colors already in the HSL color space skip the conversion to RGB.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了h，s和l，则它们表示返回的颜色的通道值；的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析然后转换为HSL颜色空间。有关示例，请参见颜色。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后转换为HSL。 （HSL颜色空间中已经存在的颜色将跳过向RGB的转换。）

trans-unit.source: If h, s and v are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to the HSV color space. See d3.color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to HSV.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了h，s和v，则它们表示返回的颜色的通道值；的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析后转换为HSV颜色空间。有关示例，请参见d3.color。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后转换为HSV。

trans-unit.source: If id is specified, sets the id accessor to the given function and returns this stratify operator. Otherwise, returns the current id accessor, which defaults to:
trans-unit.target: 如果ID指定，设置ID访问给定函数并返回此分层操作。否则，返回当前的id访问器，默认为：

trans-unit.source: If id is specified, sets the node id accessor to the specified function and returns this force. If id is not specified, returns the current node id accessor, which defaults to the numeric node.index:
trans-unit.target: 如果ID指定，设置节点ID访问到指定的函数，并返回这股力量。如果未指定id，则返回当前节点ID访问器，默认为数字节点 .index：

trans-unit.source: If interpolate is not specified, defaults to d3.interpolate.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定interpolate，则默认为d3.interpolate。

trans-unit.source: If interpolate is specified, sets the interpolation factory for zoom transitions to the specified function. If interpolate is not specified, returns the current interpolation factory, which defaults to d3.interpolateZoom to implement smooth zooming. To apply direct interpolation between two views, try d3.interpolate instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果插补指定，设置了变焦过渡到指定函数的插值工厂。如果未指定interpolate，则返回当前的插值工厂，默认为d3.interpolateZoom以实现平滑缩放。要在两个视图之间应用直接插值，请尝试使用d3.interpolate。

trans-unit.source: If interpolate is specified, sets the scale’s range interpolator factory. This interpolator factory is used to create interpolators for each adjacent pair of values from the range; these interpolators then map a normalized domain parameter t in [0, 1] to the corresponding value in the range. If factory is not specified, returns the scale’s current interpolator factory, which defaults to d3.interpolate. See d3-interpolate for more interpolators.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了插值，则设置比例尺的范围插值器工厂。该插值器工厂用于为范围中的每对相邻值创建插值器；然后，这些插值器将[0，1]中的归一化域参数t映射到范围内的相应值。如果未指定factory，则返回标尺的当前插值器工厂，默认为d3.interpolate。有关更多内插器，请参见d3内插。

trans-unit.source: If interpolate is specified, sets the scale’s range interpolator factory. This interpolator factory is used to create interpolators for each adjacent pair of values from the range; these interpolators then map a normalized domain parameter t in [0, 1] to the corresponding value in the range. If factory is not specified, returns the scale’s current interpolator factory, which defaults to interpolate. See d3-interpolate for more interpolators.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了插值，则设置刻度的范围插值器工厂。该插值器工厂用于为范围中的每个相邻值对创建插值器；然后，这些插值器将[0，1]中的归一化域参数t映射到范围内的相应值。如果未指定factory，则返回比例尺的当前插值器工厂，默认为interpolate。有关更多内插器，请参见d3内插。

trans-unit.source: If interpolator is an array, it represents the scale’s three-element output range and is converted to an interpolator function using d3.interpolate and d3.piecewise.
trans-unit.target: 如果interpolator是一个数组，则它代表比例尺的三元素输出范围，并使用d3.interpolate和d3.piecewise转换为插值器函数。

trans-unit.source: If interpolator is an array, it represents the scale’s two-element output range and is converted to an interpolator function using d3.interpolate.
trans-unit.target: 如果interpolator是一个数组，则它代表比例尺的两个元素的输出范围，并使用d3.interpolate转换为interpolator函数。

trans-unit.source: If interpolator is specified, sets the scale’s interpolator to the specified function. If interpolator is not specified, returns the scale’s current interpolator.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了插值器，则将标尺的插值器设置为指定的函数。如果未指定插值器，则返回刻度的当前插值器。

trans-unit.source: If iterations is specified, sets the number of iterations per application to the specified number and returns this force. If iterations is not specified, returns the current iteration count which defaults to 1. Increasing the number of iterations greatly increases the rigidity of the constraint and avoids partial overlap of nodes, but also increases the runtime cost to evaluate the force.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了迭代次数，则将每个应用程序的迭代次数设置为指定的次数，并返回此力。如果迭代未指定，返回缺省值为1增加迭代的次数的当前迭代计数大大增加了约束的刚性，并且避免了节点的部分重叠，但也增加了运行时成本评估的力。

trans-unit.source: If iterations is specified, sets the number of iterations per application to the specified number and returns this force. If iterations is not specified, returns the current iteration count which defaults to 1. Increasing the number of iterations greatly increases the rigidity of the constraint and is useful for complex structures such as lattices, but also increases the runtime cost to evaluate the force.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了迭代次数，则将每个应用程序的迭代次数设置为指定的次数，并返回此力。如果迭代未指定，返回缺省值为1增加迭代的次数的当前迭代计数大大增加了约束的刚性并且是有用的复杂结构，例如格子，但也增加了运行时成本评估的力。

trans-unit.source: If iterations is specified, sets the number of iterations per application to the specified number and returns this force. If iterations is not specified, returns the current iteration count which defaults to 1. Increasing the number of iterations greatly increases the rigidity of the constraint and is useful for complex structures such as lattices, but also increases the runtime cost to evaluate the force.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了迭代次数，则将每个应用程序的迭代次数设置为指定的次数，并返回此力。如果迭代未指定，返回缺省值为1增加迭代的次数的当前迭代计数大大增加了约束的刚性并且是有用的复杂结构，例如格子，但也增加了运行时成本评估的力。

trans-unit.source: If k is negative, the Fréchet distribution with shape parameter −k
trans-unit.target: 如果k为负，则形状参数为-k的Fréchet分布

trans-unit.source: If k is positive, the Weibull distribution with shape parameter k
trans-unit.target: 如果k为正，则形状参数为k的Weibull分布

trans-unit.source: If k is zero, the Gumbel distribution
trans-unit.target: 如果k为零，则Gumbel分布

trans-unit.source: If keys is specified, sets the keys accessor to the specified function or array and returns this stack generator. If keys is not specified, returns the current keys accessor, which defaults to the empty array. A series (layer) is generated for each key. Keys are typically strings, but they may be arbitrary values. The series’ key is passed to the value accessor, along with each data point, to compute the point’s value.
trans-unit.target: 如果键被指定，设置键访问到指定的功能或阵列，并返回该堆栈发生器。如果未指定keys，则返回当前的key访问器，默认为空数组。为每个密钥生成一个系列（层）。键通常是字符串，但它们可以是任意值。系列的键与每个数据点一起传递到值访问器，以计算该点的值。

trans-unit.source: If l, a and b are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to the CIELAB color space. See color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to CIELAB. (Colors already in the CIELAB color space skip the conversion to RGB, and colors in the HCL color space are converted directly to CIELAB.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了l，a和b，则它们表示返回的颜色的通道值；否则，返回0。的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析后转换为CIELAB颜色空间。有关示例，请参见颜色。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后转换为CIELAB。 （CIELAB颜色空间中已经存在的颜色将跳过向RGB的转换，而HCL颜色空间中的颜色将直接转换为CIELAB。）

trans-unit.source: If l, a and b are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to the Lab color space. See color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to Lab. (Colors already in the Lab color space skip the conversion to RGB, and colors in the HCL color space are converted directly to Lab.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了l，a和b，则它们表示返回的颜色的通道值；的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析后转换为Lab颜色空间。有关示例，请参见颜色。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后转换为Lab。 （实验室颜色空间中已存在的颜色将跳过向RGB的转换，而HCL颜色空间中的颜色将直接转换为实验室。）

trans-unit.source: If l, c, and h are specified, these represent the channel values of the returned color; an opacity may also be specified. If a CSS Color Module Level 3 specifier string is specified, it is parsed and then converted to CIELChab color space. See color for examples. If a color instance is specified, it is converted to the RGB color space using color.rgb and then converted to CIELChab. (Colors already in CIELChab color space skip the conversion to RGB, and colors in CIELAB color space are converted directly to CIELChab.)
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了l，c和h，则它们表示返回的颜色的通道值；否则，返回0。的不透明度也可以指定。如果指定了CSS颜色模块3级说明符字符串，则将其解析，然后转换为CIELCh ab颜色空间。有关示例，请参见颜色。如果指定了颜色实例，则使用color .rgb将其转换为RGB颜色空间，然后将其转换为CIELCh ab。 （CIELCh ab颜色空间中已经存在的颜色将跳过向RGB的转换，而CIELAB颜色空间中的颜色将直接转换为CIELCh ab。）

trans-unit.source: If links is specified, sets the array of links associated with this force, recomputes the distance and strength parameters for each link, and returns this force. If links is not specified, returns the current array of links, which defaults to the empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果链接被指定时，将与该力相关联的链接阵列，重新计算距离和强度参数对于每个链路，并返回该力。如果未指定links，则返回当前的链接数组，默认为空数组。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified type and returns this request instance. If an event listener was already registered for the same type, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listener for the specified type (if any) instead. If listener is not specified, returns the currently-assigned listener for the specified type, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了侦听器，则将事件侦听器设置为指定的类型并返回此请求实例。如果已经为同一类型注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定类型（如果有）的当前事件侦听器。如果未指定监听器，则返回指定类型的当前分配的监听器（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified typenames and returns the brush. If an event listener was already registered for the same type and name, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listeners for the specified typenames, if any. If listener is not specified, returns the first currently-assigned listener matching the specified typenames, if any. When a specified event is dispatched, each listener will be invoked with the same context and arguments as selection.on listeners: the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果监听器指定，设置事件监听器指定的typenames并返回刷。如果已经为相同类型和名称注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定typenames的当前事件侦听器（如果有）。如果未指定listener，则返回与指定的typenames（如果有）匹配的第一个当前分配的监听器。调度指定事件时，将使用与selection .on相同的上下文和参数来调用每个侦听器。侦听器：当前数据 d 和索引 i ， this 上下文作为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified typenames and returns the brush. If an event listener was already registered for the same type and name, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listeners for the specified typenames, if any. If listener is not specified, returns the first currently-assigned listener matching the specified typenames, if any. When a specified event is dispatched, each listener will be invoked with the same context and arguments as selection.on listeners: the current event event and datum d, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果监听器指定，设置事件监听器指定的typenames并返回刷。如果已经为相同类型和名称注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定typenames的当前事件侦听器（如果有）。如果未指定listener，则返回与指定的typenames（如果有）匹配的第一个当前分配的监听器。调度指定事件时，将使用与selection.on相同的上下文和参数来调用每个侦听器。侦听器：当前事件 event 和数据 d ， this 上下文为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified typenames and returns the drag behavior. If an event listener was already registered for the same type and name, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listeners for the specified typenames, if any. If listener is not specified, returns the first currently-assigned listener matching the specified typenames, if any. When a specified event is dispatched, each listener will be invoked with the same context and arguments as selection.on listeners: the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果监听器指定，设置事件监听器指定的typenames并返回拖拽行为。如果已经为相同类型和名称注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定typenames的当前事件侦听器（如果有）。如果未指定listener，则返回与指定的typenames（如果有）匹配的第一个当前分配的监听器。调度指定事件时，将使用与selection .on相同的上下文和参数来调用每个侦听器。侦听器：当前数据 d 和索引 i ， this 上下文作为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified typenames and returns the drag behavior. If an event listener was already registered for the same type and name, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listeners for the specified typenames, if any. If listener is not specified, returns the first currently-assigned listener matching the specified typenames, if any. When a specified event is dispatched, each listener will be invoked with the same context and arguments as selection.on listeners: the current event (event) and datum d, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果监听器指定，设置事件监听器指定的typenames并返回拖拽行为。如果已经为相同类型和名称注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定typenames的当前事件侦听器（如果有）。如果未指定listener，则返回与指定的typenames（如果有）匹配的第一个当前分配的监听器。调度指定事件时，将使用与selection.on相同的上下文和参数来调用每个侦听器。侦听器：当前事件（ event ）和数据 d ， this 上下文为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified typenames and returns the zoom behavior. If an event listener was already registered for the same type and name, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listeners for the specified typenames, if any. If listener is not specified, returns the first currently-assigned listener matching the specified typenames, if any. When a specified event is dispatched, each listener will be invoked with the same context and arguments as selection.on listeners: the current datum d and index i, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果监听器指定，设置事件监听器指定的typenames并返回缩放行为。如果已经为相同类型和名称注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定typenames的当前事件侦听器（如果有）。如果未指定listener，则返回与指定的typenames（如果有）匹配的第一个当前分配的监听器。调度指定事件时，将使用与selection .on相同的上下文和参数来调用每个侦听器。侦听器：当前数据 d 和索引 i ， this 上下文作为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified typenames and returns the zoom behavior. If an event listener was already registered for the same type and name, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listeners for the specified typenames, if any. If listener is not specified, returns the first currently-assigned listener matching the specified typenames, if any. When a specified event is dispatched, each listener will be invoked with the same context and arguments as selection.on listeners: the current event (event) and datum d, with the this context as the current DOM element.
trans-unit.target: 如果监听器指定，设置事件监听器指定的typenames并返回缩放行为。如果已经为相同类型和名称注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定typenames的当前事件侦听器（如果有）。如果未指定listener，则返回与指定的typenames（如果有）匹配的第一个当前分配的监听器。调度指定事件时，将使用与selection.on相同的上下文和参数来调用每个侦听器。侦听器：当前事件（ event ）和数据 d ， this 上下文为当前DOM元素。

trans-unit.source: If listener is specified, sets the event listener for the specified typenames and returns this simulation. If an event listener was already registered for the same type and name, the existing listener is removed before the new listener is added. If listener is null, removes the current event listeners for the specified typenames, if any. If listener is not specified, returns the first currently-assigned listener matching the specified typenames, if any. When a specified event is dispatched, each listener will be invoked with the this context as the simulation.
trans-unit.target: 如果监听器指定，设置事件监听器指定的typenames并返回此模拟。如果已经为相同类型和名称注册了事件侦听器，则在添加新侦听器之前，将删除现有侦听器。如果listener为null，则删除指定typenames的当前事件侦听器（如果有）。如果未指定listener，则返回与指定的typenames（如果有）匹配的第一个当前分配的监听器。调度指定事件后，将使用 this 上下文作为模拟来调用每个侦听器。

trans-unit.source: If lobes is specified, sets the new array of hemilobes and returns this projection; see d3.geoInterrupt for details on the format of the hemilobes array. If lobes is not specified, returns the current array of hemilobes.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了lobes，则设置新的半球形数组并返回此投影；否则，返回false。有关hemilobes数组格式的详细信息，请参见d3.geoInterrupt。如果未指定lobes，则返回当前的hemilobes数组。

trans-unit.source: If lobes is specified, sets the number of lobes (the parameter H in the literature) and returns this projection. If lobes is not specified, returns the current lobe number, which defaults to 4.
trans-unit.target: 如果叶被指定时，将叶数（参数ħ该突起在文献中），并返回。如果未指定lobes，则返回当前的波瓣编号，默认为4。

trans-unit.source: If lobes is specified, sets the number of lobes in the resulting star, and returns this projection. If lobes is not specified, returns the current lobe number, which defaults to 5.
trans-unit.target: 如果叶被指定，将在得到的星型叶数，并返回此投影。如果未指定lobes，则返回当前的波瓣编号，默认为5。

trans-unit.source: If min is specified, sets the minimum alpha to the specified number in the range [0,1] and returns this simulation. If min is not specified, returns the current minimum alpha value, which defaults to 0.001. The simulation’s internal timer stops when the current alpha is less than the minimum alpha. The default alpha decay rate of ~0.0228 corresponds to 300 iterations.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了min，则将最小alpha设置为[0,1]范围内的指定数字，并返回此模拟。如果未指定min，则返回当前的最小alpha值，默认为0.001。当前的alpha值小于最小alpha值时，模拟的内部计时器将停止。〜0.0228 的默认alpha衰减率对应于300次迭代。

trans-unit.source: If modifiers is specified, sets whether the brush listens to key events during brushing and returns the brush. If modifiers is not specified, returns the current behavior, which defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了修饰符，则设置笔刷是否在笔刷过程中侦听关键事件并返回笔刷。如果未指定修饰符，则返回当前行为，默认为true。

trans-unit.source: If nodes is specified, sets the simulation’s nodes to the specified array of objects, initializing their positions and velocities if necessary, and then re-initializes any bound forces; returns the simulation. If nodes is not specified, returns the simulation’s array of nodes as specified to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点被指定时，将仿真的节点到指定对象数组，初始化它们的位置，并且如果必要的速度，然后重新初始化任何结合力 ; 返回模拟。如果未指定nodes，则将指定的模拟节点数组返回给构造函数。

trans-unit.source: If offset is a function, it is passed the generated series array and the order index array. The offset function is then responsible for updating the lower and upper values in the series array to layout the stack. For example, the default offset is defined as:
trans-unit.target: 如果offset是一个函数，则将其传递给生成的序列数组和顺序索引数组。然后，偏移函数负责更新序列数组中的下限值和上限值以布局堆栈。例如，默认偏移量定义为：

trans-unit.source: If offset is specified, sets the offset accessor to the specified function and returns this stack generator. If offset is not specified, returns the current offset acccesor, which defaults to stackOffsetNone; this uses a zero baseline. See stack offsets for the built-in offsets.
trans-unit.target: 如果偏移量被指定时，设置偏移存取到指定的功能，并返回该堆栈发生器。如果未指定offset，则返回当前的偏移量赋值器，默认为stackOffsetNone。这使用零基准。有关内置偏移量，请参见堆栈偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If offset is specified, sets the offset accessor to the specified function or array and returns this stack generator. If offset is not specified, returns the current offset acccesor, which defaults to stackOffsetNone; this uses a zero baseline. See stack offsets for the built-in offsets.
trans-unit.target: 如果偏移量被指定时，设置偏移存取到指定的功能或数组，并返回该堆栈发生器。如果未指定offset，则返回当前的偏移量赋值器，默认为stackOffsetNone。这使用零基准。有关内置偏移量，请参见堆栈偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If order is a function, it is passed the generated series array and must return an array of numeric indexes representing the stack order. For example, the default order is defined as:
trans-unit.target: 如果order是一个函数，它将传递给生成的序列数组，并且必须返回一个表示堆栈顺序的数字索引数组。例如，默认顺序定义为：

trans-unit.source: If order is specified, sets the order accessor to the specified function or array and returns this stack generator. If order is not specified, returns the current order acccesor, which defaults to stackOrderNone; this uses the order given by the key accessor. See stack orders for the built-in orders.
trans-unit.target: 如果顺序指定，设定顺序访问到所指定的功能或数组，并返回该堆栈发生器。如果未指定order，则返回当前的订单访问者，默认为stackOrderNone ; 这使用密钥访问者给定的顺序。请参阅堆叠订单以了解内置订单。

trans-unit.source: If order is specified, sets the order accessor to the specified function or array and returns this stack generator. If order is not specified, returns the current order accessor, which defaults to stackOrderNone; this uses the order given by the key accessor. See stack orders for the built-in orders.
trans-unit.target: 如果顺序指定，设定顺序访问到所指定的功能或数组，并返回该堆栈发生器。如果未指定order，则返回当前的订单访问器，默认为stackOrderNone ;这使用密钥访问者给定的顺序。请参阅堆叠订单以了解内置订单。

trans-unit.source: If padding is specified, sets the inner and outer padding to the specified number or function and returns this treemap layout. If padding is not specified, returns the current inner padding function.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了padding，则将内部和外部 padding设置为指定的数字或函数，并返回此树形图布局。如果未指定padding，则返回当前的内部padding函数。
